page.title: 19At Home, After School
page.content: Every afternoon when I get home from school my mum and dad are not there so it is only myself and my brother. We both clean our shoes and then I do the chickens. I collect the eggs and give them fresh water. Then I feed the rabbit. Mum comes home about six o'clock and gives us our tea. Sometimes we have baked beans on toast or we have egg, chips and fish fingers. I like watching the television or sometimes I turn my radio on. I enjoy riding my bicycle. Then we go up to bed and read for about an hour before mum comes and turns our light off.
